entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:10 a.m. EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanikiluaq Airport 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: NW 54 km/h gust 63 km/h

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this morning then periods of snow and blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
